æ¨¡å‹= SARIMAXï¼ˆå­£åº¦é”€å”®ï¼Œè®¢å•=è®¢å•ï¼Œå­£èŠ‚æ€§è®¢å•=å­£èŠ‚æ€§è®¢å•ï¼‰ ç»“æœ=æ¨¡å‹ã€‚åˆèº«ï¼ˆï¼‰
é¢„æµ‹ = results.get_forecast(steps=4) Forecast_index = pd.date_range(start='2013-01-01', period=4, freq='Q') Forecast_series = pd.Series(forecast.predicted_mean,index=forecast_index)
